languages.text: When the wearer uses Endure, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: [draft] When the wearer uses Endure, he immediately ends one of the effects acting on him in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, poison, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.
When the wearer uses Endure, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, poison, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

When the wearer uses Endure, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者使用隐忍待发时，会立刻按照以下优先度移除一项负面效果：{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、中毒、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Endure, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, toxin, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用隐忍待发时，会立刻按照以下优先度移除一项负面效果：{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、中毒、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}。

languages.text: При применении способности Стойкость с персонажа немедленно снимается один из следующих эффектов в указанном порядке: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Endure, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, poison, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: При использовании Стойкости с персонажа немедленно снимается один из следующих эффектов в указанном порядке: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}.

При использовании Стойкости с персонажа немедленно снимается один из следующих эффектов в указанном порядке: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が耐久を使用すると、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、毒、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}の順番で直ちに効果の1つを取り除く。
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Endure, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, toxin, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が耐久を使用すると、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、毒、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}の順番で直ちに効果の1つを取り除く。

languages.text: Si el portador usa Aguantar, elimina al instante uno de los efectos que sufra en el siguiente orden: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, toxina, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Endure, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, toxin, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador usa Aguantar, elimina al instante uno de los efectos que sufra en el siguiente orden: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, veneno, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger Ertragen nutzt, entfernt er sofort einen der Effekte auf sich in folgender Reihenfolge: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Endure, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger Ertragen nutzt, entfernt er sofort einen der Effekte auf sich in folgender Reihenfolge: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}, Gift, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur a recours à l'effet Supporter, l'un des effets dont il est la cible se dissipe immédiatement (dans l'ordre : {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, Toxine et {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}).
